No. 117470) Sub: Clarification on status of claims accrued claims post transfer of 100% shares in the PPP Projects reg: The Authority _ide policy circulars dated 09.06.2015 and 09.09.2015 (copy enclosed) had permitted 100% equity divestment after two years of construction completion for all BOT projects. 2 _ In this context; it is hereby clarified that upon 100% equity divestment; the outgoing Promoter shall not have residual rights over the accrued claims and the Same shall vest with new Promoter. Henceforth, a Supplementary Agreement shall be signed with the Concessionaire at the time of 100% share transfer. 3_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority.
